latex: Bob and Joe eat at a restaurant and both get their bills. The waiter doesn't like Bob, so he secretly raises the price by $25\%$. Bob then tips $20\%$ on that. Bob, being bad at counting, gives $40\%$ more than he is supposed to. The waiter being good friends with Joe, decreases his bill by $30\%$. Joe also gets a $40\%$ discount. Finally, Joe tips $25\%$. Now both of them paid the same amount. If both original prices were an integer amount of dollars, what is the smallest possible original price of Joe's meal(in dollars)?
